title: Im getting stuck at installing software update
content:
When i brought this phone in February 2021 it was on Android 10 so i tried to update it into android 11 (which was already out)
But the moment i tap on the check for update it was saying that it was up to date so i had to update it manually and the security update too but this march security update release but i didnt got any notification or something so i tired to check for update but the circle was looping again and again so i wanted to try with a vpn and then a update pop up but it wasnt downling anything.so will be glad if you help qith this software updates
